data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zamani, Alireza (2018): The spider genus Pterotricha Kulczynski, 1903 (Araneae, Gnaphosidae) in the United Arab Emirates. Evolutionary Systematics 2 (2): 151-161, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/evolsyst.2.29981, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/evolsyst.2.29981
